sourcing.instructions: B2: Chemical supply stores; Cu: metal suppliers; Er: rare earth suppliers; Ni: industrial metal suppliers; Tb: rare earth suppliers.
steps: B2: Chemical supply stores; Cu: metal suppliers; Er: rare earth suppliers; Ni: industrial metal suppliers; Tb: rare earth suppliers.
1. Measure 192 g of B2 using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 192 g of B2 using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 4-6 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 4-6 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solid sample from the crucible.
